overview.summary: Specify a time slice of Uintah Data Archive data.

description.p: Uintah data is organized by timesteps of output. This module allows the user to select a timestep for viewing.

To create an animation of data over time, build your visualization net, then select "animate" and "execute". The time slices of data will be loaded in successive order and the output can be viewed as an animation.
The "time step increment" entry can be change to allow skipping of timesteps during animation. (ie. a value of 5 shows every 5th timeslice)

A text time value and a simulation clock are output for display in the view window. The font size for text is selectable and the position in the view is editable via the red ball in the "Time Step Position" square. The clock can be located using the red ball in the "Clock Position" square. The clock display can be further edited via the entry boxes on the lower right of the interface.
